data.title: STD & Telephone Area Codes United States
data.meta_description: List of 291 area codes in United States. STD Codes and telephone area dialing codes in United States. Find out how to call different cities in United States using area codes.
data.text:
Area Codes in United States

Given below is the complete list of area codes in United States. The table below shows all the 291 area codes in United States. United States area codes usually have 3 digits. While calling United States from abroad, you need to dial the ISD code followed by the area code and finally the phone number.

â€‹ Find Area Code

Given below is a list of area codes for calling United States's major cities/regions.

Click here to know How to call United States from abroad
